description: This file demonstrates how to maintain user-specific state in a multi-user environment using an in-memory shopping list database, with functions to add, remove, and retrieve items for each user session, and an Agent object configured to handle these interactions.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an AI agent capable of handling tools and maintaining state.

methods.name: add_item
methods.description: Adds an item to the current user's shopping list based on session state.

methods.name: remove_item
methods.description: Removes an item from the current user's shopping list based on session state.

methods.name: get_shopping_list
methods.description: Retrieves the shopping list for the current user session.
